tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,Scaling / Polishing,Dental Fillings,Teeth Reshaping,
review:
What matters to a person who is suffering, an immediate help at hand ! Such was my case, I remember it was the day of Eid and I had throbbing pain in my tooth, with lockdown in place and a fear of contamination I was skeptical to go out for a  consultation. Using Practo, I searched for a dentist closer to my home and I found Dr. Safi there. 
With uncertainty in my mind, I went ahead to get treatment. The moment you step in the clinic you will realize that you have come to the right place. It is a clean and a well maintained one. They practiced necessary sterilization protocols and from whatever I learnt in my education; I could see the sterilization practiced here. I was welcomed by Dr. Safi , who gave his appointments even on festival and looked into my case and suggested the treatment.
I was aware that I had 2-3 issues with my teeth and he actually pointed all of them out in my first visit. He described my dental issues in detail and also informed me the step by step process on how he will be approaching in multiple sittings.
I was amazed by his ********* *** *** patience to make me understand. He would even provide you multiple lines of treatment, which you can choose based on your pocket, he is not the one who would say the best ones are the expensive ones. 
I am writing this review after my complete treatment and I must say I am amazed and blessed that I could get this done on time and with a thorough professional, that he is. 
Now that you have read this review, you can understand that the time I took to pen this down shows my respect for the value of treatment provided. 
Please proceed and get treatment for you and your closed ones.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A MUST READ REVIEW:
In short:
If you came to this page for a good dental clinic then your search ends here. Go to this clinic without any doubts and fear in your mind and thank me later for this suggestion. I am saying this from my personal experience I had on this clinic. ü§óü§ó  
**** ******** **** ** *** **** ****** ****** ** ********* in terms of:
‚Ä¢ The Cleanliness of this place
‚Ä¢ The Behaviour of the whole staff
‚Ä¢ The Professionalism in the work
‚Ä¢ The Suggestions provided by the doctor
‚Ä¢ The Treatment 
‚Ä¢ The Outstanding ability to make you feel confident and fear-free 
‚Ä¢ Money: The Treatment is affordable

Every point here is 5/5 stars.

The treatment is painless even when they put the injection and this is amazing. 

If you want to know my whole experience with them, here you go:

I had a phobia of going to doctors and get treated. Unfortunately I faced toothache in one of my teeth. 
Basically I am from Haryana but was here in Hyderabad for my office work.
Believe me I literally searched for two days to find the best dental clinic in Hyderabad. Lot of people suggested me to go to dental clinic chains but I was not satisfied from inside. One day I found a link on Quora about The Dental Room. And I searched it on Google. After reading some reviews I felt that let's give it a try and I called them immediately. 
And the point the lady starting talking showed a professionalism of the clinic. You know that you judge a thing from the first impression.
Anyways I went to the clinic, talked with the Receptionist mam and finally to the doctor. 
Roohi Mam checked the issues thoroughly and gave me suggestions to go for root canal treatment. I heard that Root canal is painful treatment so I was very scared at that point. But after talking with mam I felt relaxed. 
For some reasons I had to move out of City for two weeks but I fixed in my mind to get treated from here only. 
I came back to Hyderabad and got my treatment from the mastermind Dr. Safi. Both are very friendly and great human beings.

After talking to him I felt unafraid.
The treatment went totally painless from injecting the local anaesthesia to the filling and cleaning. 
I cannot express in words they provided the service.
Thank you to the mam at the reception

A lot of thanks to Dr Safi and specially Roohi Mam who gave the confidence and great treatment. ‚ù§Ô∏èü§ó‚ò∫Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Safi for the dental check up of my 8 year old son. He wasn't losing his 1set of tooth (molar) while d permanent tooth are in position. Dr Safi advised to observe the tooth patiently for couple of months. While we wait, without any fruitful result of the baby teeth falling by itself for months and the new teeth at the risk of losing it's shape, doctor advised us to extract the baby teeth. I was bit concerned about the forceful extraction ( though needed as the young and old teeths are fighting for space from 6-months). The doctor made my son very comfortable about the process and I appreciate his style of dealing with kids + his perfection in his work. He removed the tooth without a single tear or scream coming out from my 8 year old and my son didn't hesitate for a revisit to dentist. This proves the kids comfort and co fidence in his doctor. Also, he provided us with lot of insights about the problem and how to care for teeth in d coming years. I appreciate his professionalism and service. The staff and the facility at the dental room is very nice. All in all, I had a nice and comfortable experience at the dental room.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hello All...
This is Mounika, Recently I had my treatment done at Dental Room where DR. SAFI did an excellent job. *** ** ** **** ******** *** *** **** ************ * **** ******* *** ********* ** **** *****. Where I recommend whoever have a problem with their tooth or how much critical it is. He will show the way and make you happy with his treatment.

Coming to my treatment part, I have my from 2 teeth bigger and I want to get those two big teeth shorter where it has to be resized. I just searched for many Dental hospitals. Finally found the Dental Room in Practo. I just read the reviews and visited the place for the first time. Later after meeting DR. Safi and shared my problem with him. He suggested me to go for the root canal treatment for the front 2 teeth and resized my teeth with zirconium crowns which is actually typical case in my problem. Because it‚Äôs not easy thing to make a decision making your original teeth shorter by root canal and later replacing with perfect match teeth. He did it perfectly.  Trust me the confindence levels of DR.SAFI in the treatment what he is giving is Amazing. When he explained me the steps how he is going to deal my case I got confidence that he is right person I came down to.  He is definitely the best and Awesome doctor in our Hyderabad. And more passionate about his job and work which makes him out standing and unique. And even the treatment cost is offardable. hospitals *** ****** **** ** *** **** **** *** ******* *** ***** ******** *********** **. SAFIüôèüèªüôèüèªüôèüèª

Coming to part of Ambiance.. it‚Äôs Amazing and very neat and kean place..üëçüëçüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our experience at The Dental Room was without a doubt the best dentist experience till date, across Hyderabad, Bangalore and Kolkata. The doctor listened to our needs very well, and explained in exact detail the course he was suggesting. The facilities were really clean, all COVID protocols were strictly followed. We were treated for a general checkup, cleaning + polishing and filling of a couple of cavities, very happy with the results. In the past, most of the dentists in our experience tried pushing toothpastes, brushes, floss and such - but here, the doctor encouraged us to buy his recommended stuff from Amazon or the local shop, so clearly he wasn‚Äôt trying to push any random stuff. Really appreciate the professionalism, on top of the high quality of work done!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ******I am saying this after my couple of interaction with him..At first  visit he did filling for me and when i was not satisfied he did it the 2nd time to fix the issue.Today i visited him for my wife who had a non healing ulcer near the lower jaw for almost 4weeks , he instantly recognised the real issue and extracted the tooth which was causing it due to its disorientation.we had no idea why her neck & ear were paining. And Safi sir explained it so well that we were ready for the extraction although we were on our way to office.it took only 1 hr for the complete procedure and we came back home without a toothüòÅ but with peace of mind because of him.Thanks Safi sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thank You ,Dr Safi Quraishi  for being such a wonderful doctor and leaving an ever-lasting impression with your 
professional skills and being considerate. I landed into your clinic for my sister's(Sulekha Kumari) dental treatment after being advised by my friend.My sister has lost her  3 front teeth in a feat of epilepsy 7 yrs back. I was bit concerned if her epilepsy could pose any risk if she ever needed to go for tooth implantation.On the other hand I was also planning to get her married.Today I am happy to write that  my sister has got her smile back .She is gaining confidence and beaming with positivity.A special thanks to your co-doctors and other staffs for putting hope in life

tags: None
review:
We needed the wisdom tooth to be extracted. ** ***** **** ** **** ***** ****** ***** ***** ** ************ ***** *** ****** **** * **** ** *** **************** *** ********* we googled and got the number of The Dental Room at Tolichowki. Got an immediate appointment.
*** **** ** ********** He clearly explained the procedure, and did the extraction of both the wisdom teeth in a little more than an hour. He instructed on the post care procedure which we followed carefully. We went for a review the following week, and he examined and all is well. 
The clinic is spic and span, the assistant is good as well, the equipment modern, and the doctor is awesome.
Wait there is more.... You get all of these benefits at a very economical charge. Seriously, gold.
Go to Dr. Safi for any dental issue you might have .. you will not regret it.
__ Michael and Mary.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited The Dental room in Tolichowki, when my left upper molar got chipped and after a while got inflammed. It caused me tremendous pain. I was much worried that an infection may have occured that would get out of hand. Then I visited  Dr. Safiuddin Qureshi at the Dental Room, Tokichowki with an intention to consult only first. 

I thank God for the way he put me at ease and I accepted it immediately when he suggested the tooth extraction. In an unbelievably painless 20-25 min procedure, he carefully removed the teeth. His fees was genuinely pocket friendly too.

I left with a lot of respect for the Doctor and his clinic that day. I followed his advice at the follow up visit a week later and am doing fine. Time permitting I hope to visit the Dental room soon for some other dental health requirements. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ****** **** ** **** ***** My experience has been very very good with Dr. Saifuddin. I have been seeing him for my kids and for other family members for a quite sometimes.Doctor Saifuddin is very friendly *** ******** *** **** ********** The clinic is well equipped & maintained, staffs are extremely co-operative and caring.Unlike other clinics , The Dental Room doesn't work for üí∞ instead it works to provide best treatment to the patients which I have been experiencing since my first visit. Honestly, I will recommend this clinic and  Dr. Saifuddin to all who have any dental problems. Thanks..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited the Dental Room, for a very sharp pain in my upper pre moral teeth and came out with a smile on my face, and that because of Dr Safi and Dr Roohi. Initially when i got diagnosed for a RCT, i really got petrified because of my fear of pain and thats when Dr Roohi pacified me and handled initial process smoothly and swiftly. I am really happy with the way they understood my problem and suggested the treatments that needs to be done. I got my RCT done by Dr Safi, it was great visiting the clinic. Charges are also nominal as compared to other doctors. I would definitely recommend the Dental Room to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to thank all the doctors and team at the dental room *** ** ********* ********* **** **** **** *** *** Very professional and confident in what they do. They make sure no matter what procedure is done, it done with absolute perfection and as less pain as possible! When I asked the doctor about the invisible braces, the explanation he gave stage wise was so convincing and he showed me what I can expect in reality and not to go with what the digital softwares show. * ***** **** **** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ******* ** ********* *** would recomend to all who wants pure Quality!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My name is Abdul Rafeeq. I had cavities problem and food use to stuck between and around the tooth‚Äôs. It was really difficult to floss and as a result things were worsening and my gums started to loose the strength. I visited Dr Safiuddin and he was very impressive. He did a fantastic job and by God‚Äôs grace all completed very nicely. Finally, i‚Äôm happy to see the strength in my gums. Overall, this is go-to place for any tooth problem, not just proper treatment but the timelines of appointments were met so accurately, no wait time, no unwanted expenses and pretty fast n awesome job. Finally, i‚Äôm more than satisfied and ready to smile. 
A BIG Thnk TO Dr Safiuddin and team keep up the good work guys, Good luck!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Visited Dental Room to consult for tooth ache which was troubling me since a month. visited a clinic near my home, they suggested me to go for 2 Root canals and 2 crowns and one implant. I somehow wasn't satisfied and did some research online. Found this clinic and read some awesome reviews about Dr. Safi Quraishi! Trust me, its an awesome experience to get treated by him everything about him online is so much true! Nice and caring Doctor with genius treatment plans. He recommended me to go for just 2 fillings and 1 root canal with crown and that solved my problem! Treatment was pain free, neat and clean. I would recommend this clinic to everyone looking for genuine treatments and no unnecessary stuff. Dont expect much discounts like any other comercial clinics today since the prices are very reasonable for the quality they are providing!!!

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Teeth Reshaping,Teeth Whitening,Dental Crowns,RCT - Single Sitting,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** ******* * **** **** ******** **** **** ************* *** ************ ********* Very well maintained, elite dental facility. Though I live in Saudi Arabia, I make it a point to visit this 'Dental Room" for any of my dental treatments whenever I visit Hyderabad. With my personal experience at the clinic, I would say that its a dental clinic that patient would leave with a big bright smile on the face. I strongly recommend "The Dental Room" for any of your dental treatments in Hyderabad city

review:
Explanation on the tooth issue is crystal clear (in terms of cause, future damage, recovery stages)and treatment procedure is discussed in detail before starting and total satisfaction on the treatment process.

Clean premises and good behavior's towards patients by staff members and Doctors.

tags: None
review: Whenever I open my mouth i feeling pain below my ear which is TMJ disorder pain consulted him explained the issue clearly and prescribed tablets hope it will reduce

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Clinic is awsome n well equipped, doctors n staff are very polite.
Dr. Safi is highly experienced, professional, humble n genuine. He extracted my lower third molar (surgically) in few minutes with entire procedure being painless, really thankful to him.
I had a wonderful experience at Dental Room and greatly recommend it to all !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Saif is a brilliant dentist with great expertise in RCT. I visited him for RCT and it was wonderful to be treated by him. He is an apt dentist who gives enough time to his patients. He is supported by his wife who is also a brilliant dentist. I did my one RCT and I am certain to go for another very soon. Kudos to Dr Saif and his wife.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I have been pleased with the kindness and professionalism that I received from the Dental room. The staff has treated me will with respect and priority. I came here for braces and Dr Safi fixed my teeth within limited period of time. I‚Äôm thankful in helping me to achieve the great smile that will last for lifetime for sure. Thank you!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited this clinic when a tooth started hurting on my vacation to Hyderabad. Coming from Dubai, I was sceptical about the neatness and honestly of the doctors here. But The Dental Room surpassed all expectations. Dr. Safi & Dr. Roohi have maintained an organised and spotless clinic. The prices are on par with the treatment given as they dont encourage mass patients or crowded practices with decreased rates. RCT, Crowns and cleaning done here. Very satisfied! Thank you!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Treatment took sometime but it was worth the time,  now I'm able smile again. Dr. Quraishi's guidance and explanation about the treatment and educating about it was a great experience for me. I would always recommend all my friends and family for their dental issues\/requirements to go to \"The Dental Room.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: Thank you for taking such good care of me during my recent discomfort. The entire staff was supportive and caring and provided excellent care to me.The doctor clearly explained the cause and the purpose of the treatment. I really appreciate his clean work !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Awesome Treatment provided by Dr.Safi and Dr.Sana

We went to "The Dental room" for Wisdom tooth extraction for my brother. 
Dr.Safi performed the extraction without much pain and very smoothly.
He did verified the tooth extraction completion via XRay and finished the work.

Dr.Sana gave perfect recommendations about do's/don't's with perfect care....

Fully Satisfied...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I don't normally review unless I feel it's the best. The Dental Room is the best Dental clinic I've been to. Dr. Safi and Dr. Roohi were both excellent. The information given, treatment, follow-up and cost of extraction are at par the best in the city. I really would suggest you to visit them once and I'm sure you'll make them your permanent dentists.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited The Dental Room via practo for the treatment of tooth loss. Alhamdulillah satisfied with the treatment and had a new teeth implant done with the doctor's ******* *** professional expertise.May Allah bless him lifelong. I do recommend this clinic to anyone with dental problems in Hyderabad.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited The Dental Room owing to a cavity in one of my molar teeth. Dr. Safiuddin performed an x-ray and suggested to go for dental filling instead of the RCT as the cavity hadn't entered my pulp yet. I was convinced by his suggestion, post which he performed the procedure  giving enough time and making sure everything was OK. It has been a couple of days and the filling seems to have worked just fine.

review:
If someone wants their teeth to be safe then with no other thought just go to THE DENTAL ROOM and leave the rest to Dr.Safi. His mastery in dentistry is outstanding ! Most knowledgeable and skilfull dentist in town who can deal with any dental concern and will always suggest the best solution to it. I went to him with clouded mind after being through a horrific experience at a famous corporate dental hospital. Dr.Safi patiently corrected all the mistakes previous dentists have made with my teeth , and moreover I was told that it couldn't be changed foreverüòî
After first consultation i was assured that I am at the right place, with careful planning and guidance he solved my issues in the most beautiful way! The result is a bright smile .. I must say his skills are gifted by god ..as his work is FLAWLESS!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I had the good fortune of having Dr Saifuddin as my dentist. He provide best possible care and treatment plan for his patients. I'm terribly afraid of the dentists but Dr Safi completely proven me wrong and made me very comfortable during my dental treatment. ** ** ********* experienced and confident in his work. No unnecessary visits needed, hassle free and painless treatment. Believe me , you will fall in love with ur smile after your dental treatment from Dr Safi . I had thorough and painless dental cleaning and scaling, had painless molar extraction. He is specialized in composite tooth fillings. thanks a lot Dr safi. He do what he speaks. Highly recommended. He is my family dentist now.

I have been to THE DENTAL ROOM after a lot of research on Google about best dental hospitals in Hyderabad. I could gather enough courage after seeing reviews to visit this place.

I consulted Dr.Safiuddin for my bleeding gums issue. He clearly explained me the cause and suggested me to undergo teeth cleaning.It took 20 mins for the procedure and he gave some medication.

I'm very happy with the way the doctor treats his patients and I would highly recommend this place for any dental issues.
